LONDON( Reuters)- Google Inc wants to avoid a lengthy legal battle with European Union regulators investigating its market dominance, the Sunday Telegraph quoted its chief executive as saying. We certainly want to avoid that, Eric Schmidt told the paper in an interview. 2011 Turin: Fiat SpA Chief Executive Officer Sergio Marchionne confirmed the Italian carmaker's pledge to spend? 20 billion( Dh100.8 billion) revamping its domestic plants after meeting with Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi . Fiat is a multinational which is expanding internationally, but will keep an Italian heart, Industry Minister Paolo Romani said yesterday after discussing the investment plan with the CEO and Chairman John Elkann . CONGRESSWOMAN Gabrielle Giffords 's condition has been upgraded from critical to serious, Tucson's University Medical Centre said today. The hospital said the change was made because she is no longer on a ventilator. It reported she continues to do well. Earlier today, her friend Senator Kirsten Gillibrand said Ms Gabrielle Giffords had improved to the point where she could move both sides of her body, including her arms and legs.
